name: JigsawStack
title: jigsawstack.com
payoff: AI models for your tech stack
shortDescription: JigsawStack provides custom small AI models tailored for specific tech stack needs, powered by scalable infrastructure. It is designed for developers and tech companies looking to enhance their applications with AI capabilities. Example use case: A tech company integrates JigsawStack's vOCR for real-time voice to text conversion to improve accessibility in their app.
pros: Integrate in seconds on any platform
Custom small models for specialized use cases

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: OpenAI
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Broad range of AI tools and APIs
